name: Niftyflow – Form & Calculator Builder
author: niftyflowrocks

sections.description:
Niftyflow is a drag-and-drop form and calculator builder that enables you to easily create highly customizable form and calculator widgets.
This plugin allows you to easily embed widgets created with our builder into your WordPress website using shortcodes.

Demo

Try a demo of our easy calculator builder for free on our website – instant access, no signup required.

Requirements

The plugin requires a niftyflow account. You can sign up for free at niftyflow.rocks.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or extract the zip file and drop the contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Before proceeding, make sure you’ve prepared a form or calculator for embedding. If you haven’t created one yet, you can do so at niftyflow.rocks.
  4. In your form or calculator widget on niftyflow navigate to Share > WordPress Plugin, and copy the shortcode.
  5. You can now use the shortcode in any post/page and with page builders, including Gutenberg and Elementor.”
sections.faq:
Where can I find your Privacy Policy and Terms of Use?

Our Privacy Policy can be found at NiftyFlow Privacy Policy, and our Terms of Use are available at NiftyFlow Terms Of Use.

short_description: Create multilingual price quote, ROI, and finance calculators with drag & drop. Easy to embed on any website. No developer or coding skills required.

screenshots.caption: Copy the shortcode from your calculator or form widget from the niftyflow editor
Add a "Shortcode" block in the WordPress editor
Paste the widget shortcode you copied earlier into the "Shortcode" block
After saving your changes your calculator or form widget will be visible on the preview page
